page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: In{Hunsingore}and{Walshford}almost all the land is cultivated.On farms around {Walshford}and{Hunsingore}there are sheep,lambs,cows bullocks and chickens December and January are just about the busiest months of the year because it is lambing time and farmers some times have to stay up all night to help the lambs.If the sheep dies the lamb is an orphan and has to be bottle fed.Bottle feeding means that you get some powdered milk for lambs, and mix it up with water,put it in a bottle and let the lamb suck it.There are some other kinds of ways to feed them as well.This is a list of the things that are used at harvest time:a combined harvester,a baler,a tractor,a trailer and elevator.There are all types of crops grown around here.There is barley,wheat,rape,potatoes,mangolds and peas.A helicopter sprays the crops
